00035     BARRIER_RAISE,

00037     BARRIER_ALL_DROP

00040 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00049 class uvm_barrier 
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     uvm_barrier();
00053     ~uvm_barrier();
00054 
00055     void wait(void);
00056     int get_num_barriers();
00057     void set_drain_time (sc_core::sc_time drain);
00058     sc_core::sc_time get_drain_time (void);
00059     void raise_barrier(int count = 1);
00060     void drop_barrier(int count = 1);
00061 
00062     uvm_callback_agent * get_callback_agent(uvm_barrier_cb_type barrier_action);
00063 
00064 
00065 private:
00066     void wait_drain_time();
00067 
00068     int               _n_barriers;      // # of threads left to wait.
00069     sc_core::sc_time  _drain_time;
00070     sc_core::sc_event _barrier_event;   // Event to wait on.
00071     sc_core::sc_event _raise_event;
00072     sc_core::sc_event _drop_event;
00073
